Property.name: staging_base_directory
Property.Description: Path to a staging staging directory which will be used to transfer and manipulate files to before deployment

Property.name: staging_remote_agent
Property.Description: Agent which will be used for staging

Property.name: staging_remote_directory
Property.Description: Base directory on the staging server where package should be downloaded to

Property.name: username
Property.Description: Username to access Serena Dimensions CM.

Property.name: password
Property.Description: Password to access Serena Dimensions CM.

Property.name: dbname
Property.Description: Specifies the Serena Dimensions CM database identifier.

Property.name: dsn
Property.Description: Specifies the data source name for connecting to the database.
